name: Zombie Game (nunoareia)
description:
Zombie themed micro-game, first digital game I ever made, was made as a learning project.

Is a top-down zombie shooter, where you try to survive as long as you can, there is no ending implemented yet, so the game goes on forever, for now, you loose when the zombies go past you at any point in the screen.

Made on Unity with Playmaker.

Controls:

Left and Right Arrow Keys: Move Left and Right.

Space Bar: Shoot

Alt+F4 to Quit.
